ched_psg_reference: CMO No. 14, s. 2009 / CMO No. 5, s. 2008

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Biology / Life Science
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Anatomy, Physiology, Microbiology, Parasitology — all Year 1-2 core subjects
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Will struggle with Anatomy and Physiology in Year 1

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Chemistry
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Biochemistry in Year 1, Pharmacology in Year 2-3
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Drug dosage calculations and biochemistry will be difficult

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Mathematics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Drug dosage calculations, statistics in nursing research
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Pharmacology dosage errors are a patient safety concern — early intervention needed

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: English / Communication
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Clinical documentation, patient education, nursing research writing
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Documentation quality and clinical communication affected

key_college_subjects: Care of Mother, Child and Adolescent

tesda_alternative.description: Entry-level healthcare aide qualification. Can be pursued if full BSN is not immediately accessible.

degree: Bachelor of Science in Medical Technology

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Biology / Life Science
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Microbiology, Parasitology, Hematology, Immunology
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Core laboratory science subjects will be very difficult

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Chemistry
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Clinical Chemistry is the most heavily weighted board exam subject
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Clinical Chemistry failure is the most common board exam reason

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Mathematics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Laboratory calculations, quality control, statistics in clinical research
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Reagent and result calculation errors in lab practice

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Physics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Medical instrumentation, spectrophotometry basics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Minor impact — can be remediated in college

tesda_alternative.description: No TESDA alternative for Medical Technology — full BSN degree is required for licensure.

degree: Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering
ched_psg_reference: CMO No. 30, s. 2007 / CHED Engineering PSG

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Mathematics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Calculus 1-3, Differential Equations, Engineering Mathematics — all Year 1-2
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Cannot pass Year 1 engineering math — high dropout risk

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Physics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Engineering Mechanics, Statics, Dynamics, Fluid Mechanics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Physics-based subjects will cause repeated failures

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Chemistry
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Materials Science and Engineering — concrete, steel properties
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Moderate impact — chemistry use is limited compared to math/physics

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Mathematics — Analytical
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Structural analysis, probability in design
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Affects quality of structural analysis work

tesda_alternative.qualification: Construction-related TESDA NCs (Masonry NC II, Plumbing NC II)
tesda_alternative.description: Not equivalent to engineering but provides construction industry entry point if full degree is delayed.

ched_psg_reference: CMO No. 82, s. 2017 — Teacher Education PSG

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: English / Communication
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Language instruction, lesson planning, classroom communication
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: English communication is the primary teaching medium — major risk

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Filipino
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Filipino language instruction, mother tongue-based multilingual education
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Required for teaching Filipino subjects — moderate impact

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Mathematics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Mathematics instruction in elementary grades, problem-solving pedagogy
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Will struggle with teaching Math 1-6 confidently

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Science
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Science instruction in Grade 3-6
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Minor impact for early grades, more important for upper elementary

key_college_subjects: Child and Adolescent Learning and Development

tesda_alternative.description: No TESDA alternative for licensed teaching. Day care workers do not require the same licensure.

ched_psg_reference: CMO No. 82, s. 2017 — Teacher Education PSG

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Major subject alignment
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Students specialize: Math, Science, English, Filipino, Social Studies, MAPEH
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Must match chosen specialization. Math major needs strong math grades.

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: English / Communication
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Instructional delivery, report writing, communication with students and parents
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: English communication is medium of instruction at secondary level

key_college_subjects: Foundations of Special and Inclusive Education

degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
ched_psg_reference: CMO No. 25, s. 2015 — IT Education PSG

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Mathematics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.shs_equivalent: Pre-Calculus / Basic Calculus / Statistics and Probability
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Discrete Math, Calculus, Linear Algebra, Statistics — foundational to CS theory
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Algorithms and data structures course failure likely

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Physics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Computer organization and architecture — logic gates, circuits
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Minor impact unless pursuing hardware or embedded systems

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: English / Communication
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Technical writing, documentation, collaborative coding environments
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Affects ability to write technical specifications and documentation

tesda_alternative.qualification: Computer Systems Servicing NC II / Web Development (ICT-related NCs)
tesda_alternative.description: TESDA ICT qualifications provide foundational skills for entry-level IT work. Not equivalent to BSCS but valid entry point into BPO or tech support roles.

degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
ched_psg_reference: CMO No. 25, s. 2015 — IT Education PSG

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Mathematics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Applied math, networking calculations, database query optimization
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Less math-heavy than BSCS but still needed for systems analysis

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: English / Communication
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Systems documentation, client communication, project reporting
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: IT professionals need strong documentation skills in industry

tesda_alternative.qualification: Computer Systems Servicing NC II / Technical Drafting NC II
tesda_alternative.description: TESDA NCs provide direct BPO, tech support, or hardware servicing entry without a degree.

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Biology / Life Science
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Anatomy, Physiology, Microbiology — same core as nursing
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Science subjects in Year 1 will be difficult

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Chemistry
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Pharmacology basics for maternal medication
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Less critical than in BSN — moderate risk

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Mathematics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Medication dosage for maternal and newborn care
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Lower math threshold than nursing — manageable with effort

tesda_alternative.description: TESDA and DOH community midwifery programs available for rural health units. Shorter path but limited scope of practice.

degree: Bachelor of Science in Physical Therapy
ched_psg_reference: CMO Physical Therapy / Allied Health PSG
board_exam_administering_body: PRC Board of Physical and Occupational Therapy

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Biology / Life Science
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Anatomy, Kinesiology, Exercise Physiology
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Musculoskeletal anatomy is the foundation of all PT practice

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Physics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Biomechanics, modalities (ultrasound, electrical stimulation)
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Physics is unusually important in PT — modalities rely on physical principles

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Mathematics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Research statistics, gait analysis measurements
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Low math demand compared to nursing or engineering

tesda_alternative.description: No direct TESDA equivalent. PT practice requires full licensure.

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Mathematics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.shs_equivalent: Business Mathematics / General Mathematics / Basic Calculus
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Financial accounting, managerial accounting, taxation, auditing
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: All accounting subjects are math-heavy — high failure risk if below threshold

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: Business / Economics
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Economics, business law, accounting theory
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Business logic is foundation of accounting practice

scct_self_efficacy_subjects.subject: English / Communication
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.college_use: Audit reports, financial statement notes, business communication
scct_self_efficacy_subjects.risk_if_low: Report writing quality affects professional practice

tesda_alternative.description: TESDA Bookkeeping NC III is a valid entry point into accounting support roles. Not equivalent to CPA but recognized in business.
